newsitem.title: USA: EIF Holdings names Fradella Pres/CEO.
newsitem.headline: EIF Holdings names Fradella Pres/CEO.

text.p: EIF Holdings Tuesday named Frank Fradella to the post of president and chief executive.
In a statement, the company said Fradella replaces David Norris, who accepted the position of senior vice president and chief financial officer of American Eco Corp.
Mike McGinnis will remain as chairman of the board of EIF.
Fradella previously was chief operating officer American Eco.
